main event: An object was observed moving rapidly towards the east, with a white color at the forward end and a blueish trail or tail.
interesting points: The object flew a straight course with a flat trajectory.
The object was compared in size to a silver dollar at arm's length and approached at approximately 1500 mph.
The object was observed overhead by the copilot and pilot of an aircraft.
The report indicates the object was likely an
sighted object: a white object with a blueish trail or tail
witnesses: copilot and pilot of an aircraft
